snippet: The economy’s subpar recovery performance can be traced to two of the three segments of the economy, but business, the third segment, has made a strong comeback.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column on economy's subpar recovery; says that recovery since recession that ended in 2009 has been weakest in decades, mainly due to shrinking government sector and relatively slow growth in consumer spending.
lead_paragraph: The economy’s subpar recovery performance can be traced to two of the three segments of the economy, but business, the third segment, has made a strong comeback.

headline.print_headline: Business Investment Rebounds Even as Recovery Drags
headline.seo: Business Investment Rebounds Even as Recovery Drags
headline.main: Business Investment Rebounds Even as Recovery Drags
